text: The following television stations operate on virtual channel 12 in Mexico: ==Regional networks== *Radio y Televisión de Hidalgo in the state of Hidalgo ==Local stations== *XEWT-TDT in Tijuana, Baja California *XHTUG-TDT in Tuxtla Gutiérrez, Chiapas *XHAMO-TDT in Colima, Colima *XHND-TDT in Durango, Durango *XHAK-TDT in Hermosillo, Sonora *XHFM-TDT in Veracruz, Veracruz 12 virtual
title: Channel 12 virtual TV stations in Mexico
